children.html: Hello {first_name, "lovely people"}, wherever you are globally. And a particularly warm welcome to the new subscribers from India and the US who‚Äôve joined our little community since I last did one of these.

children.text: A lot‚Äôs happened since I last did a tl;dr, so expect a mix of links from over the last six weeks below ‚Äî and probably for the next couple of weeks as I play catch-up.
Thanks for all the great feedback about this format, by the way. It‚Äôs clear many people find it useful, and that gives me an incentive to keep on going.

children.html:
I recently went back to education and got a PhD in Virology from the University of Facebook.

Delighted to work with them and share my experiences. pic.twitter.com/RQaBl0EGH5

— Cormac Moore (@TheCormacMoore) December 15, 2021

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

entity.name: Education
entity.description: Education through the lens of those passionate about resources and news. This topic excludes Education policy and reform.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations
